name: Conjoined Queen
movement: burrow 20 ft., climb 30 ft., walk 40 ft.
description: The Conjoined Queen is a large monstrosity with a blend of physical and magical prowess, characterized by its imposing size and unique features.
memorable: Combines charm abilities, powerful spellcasting, and tactical burrowing movement, creating chaos on the battlefield.
goals: To manipulate and control opponents using its charm abilities and overwhelming spell power.
relations: Might be found in the company of other chaotic creatures or as a leader of lesser monstrosities.
environment: Typically resides in labyrinthine terrains or underground lairs where it can utilize its burrowing capabilities.
strengths: High physical strength and resilience, exceptional at spellcasting, and advantageous movement options.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to spell disruptions due to its reliance on magic.
attacks: Utilizes powerful melee attacks with bludgeoning and poison damage, supplemented by charming abilities.
most_powerful_ability: Pheromones that can charm and stun nearby creatures, and a daily ability that boosts allies' effectiveness in battle.
senses: Has tremorsense and darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to sense nearby creatures effectively.
skills: Proficient in perception with a +6 modifier, enabling strong awareness of surroundings.
additional_information: Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
Can create a 5-foot-diameter tunnel through solid rock.
Spellcasting abilities include a variety of offensive, defensive, and utility spells.
Sleeps in subterranean lairs where it can maximize its burrowing capabilities.
Appears as a blend of various monstrous features, contributing to its fearsome presence.
spellcasting: A 9th-level spellcaster with access to a diverse range of spells for both attack and utility.
test_queries: charming large monster with spellcasting abilities
powerful queen with poison damage attacks
monstrous spellcaster that can burrow underground
creature that stuns opponents with pheromones
large monster that creates tunnels and casts spells
